name: Quadratic
description: Quadratic is an AI-powered spreadsheet platform that combines infinite canvas spreadsheets with Python, SQL, and AI tools for advanced data analysis and visualization.
longDescription: Quadratic is a modern spreadsheet tool designed for data scientists, analysts, and teams who need more power than traditional spreadsheets like Excel. It features an infinite canvas for flexible data organization, integrates Python and SQL directly into cells for complex computations, and leverages AI to generate formulas and insights automatically. The platform aims to bridge the gap between simple spreadsheets and full programming environments, making it easier to handle large datasets and perform real-time analysis without switching tools. By solving problems like limited scalability in conventional spreadsheets, Quadratic empowers users to build dynamic models, visualizations, and dashboards collaboratively. Its mission is to democratize advanced data work, enabling non-programmers to harness coding and AI capabilities intuitively.
features: Infinite canvas allows users to organize data and visualizations freely without grid constraints, enhancing flexibility for complex projects.
Python integration enables running code directly in cells for advanced data processing, scripting, and automation, reducing the need for external tools.
AI-powered formula generation suggests and creates complex formulas based on natural language inputs, speeding up workflow for users of all skill levels.
SQL querying within the spreadsheet lets users pull and manipulate data from databases seamlessly, ideal for data analysts.
Real-time collaboration features support multiple users editing the same spreadsheet simultaneously, fostering team productivity.
Built-in data visualization tools like charts and graphs update dynamically with data changes, providing instant insights.
Support for large datasets handles millions of rows efficiently without performance lag, surpassing traditional spreadsheet limits.
API integrations connect with external services for importing data, automating workflows, and extending functionality.
Custom scripting with JavaScript allows for tailored interactions and extensions beyond standard features.
Version history and undo capabilities ensure users can track changes and revert easily, maintaining data integrity.
Mobile responsiveness enables access and basic editing on various devices, supporting on-the-go work.
Export options to CSV, Excel, or images make sharing results straightforward with non-users.

faqs.question: What makes Quadratic different from Excel or Google Sheets?
faqs.answer: Quadratic stands out with its infinite canvas, direct Python and SQL integration, and AI assistance for formulas, allowing for more advanced data analysis than traditional spreadsheets. It handles larger datasets efficiently and supports real-time collaboration without the grid limitations of conventional tools.

faqs.question: Is Quadratic free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, Quadratic offers a free plan with access to core features, though premium plans are available for advanced capabilities like unlimited AI usage and priority support.

faqs.question: How does the AI feature work in Quadratic?
faqs.answer: The AI in Quadratic analyzes your data and natural language prompts to generate formulas, suggest insights, or automate tasks, making complex operations accessible without deep coding knowledge.

faqs.question: Can I integrate Quadratic with my existing databases?
faqs.answer: Yes, Quadratic supports SQL connections to various databases, allowing you to query and import data directly into your spreadsheets for seamless analysis.

faqs.question: Is Quadratic suitable for beginners?
faqs.answer: While it offers advanced features, Quadratic's intuitive interface and AI assistance make it approachable for beginners, with tutorials available to get started quickly.

faqs.question: What programming languages does Quadratic support?
faqs.answer: Quadratic primarily supports Python for in-cell scripting and SQL for data querying, with additional JavaScript for custom extensions.

faqs.question: How secure is my data in Quadratic?
faqs.answer: Quadratic uses industry-standard encryption and security practices to protect your data, with options for private workspaces and compliance with data privacy regulations.

faqs.question: Can I collaborate with my team on Quadratic?
faqs.answer: Yes, Quadratic enables real-time collaboration where multiple users can edit spreadsheets simultaneously, similar to Google Docs but with advanced data tools.

faqs.question: What file formats can I import into Quadratic?
faqs.answer: You can import CSV, Excel, JSON, and other common formats, as well as connect to APIs and databases for live data imports.

faqs.question: Is there a mobile app for Quadratic?
faqs.answer: Quadratic is web-based and mobile-responsive, allowing access via browsers on mobile devices, though a dedicated app is not currently available.
